description:
The son of Owen and Cattelya, he is usually seen near or attached to Cattelya`s leg as she is his only remaining parent and he is far too young and timid to move on his own. During the events of the anime, he would start to gain some courage when bravely fighting against Melona when he went to rescue Cattelya and (unbeknownst to him) his father Owen during the finals of the Queen`s Blade tournament. During the tournament, he makes friends with Airi along with some of the other female competitors. He is training to become weaponsmith as his mother.
Source: Wiki
name: Rana
